subsection.name: Apache Ant
subsection.p: Build tool used to build SignServer. Version 1.7.1 and up should work.

subsection.name: JBoss, (Not MailSigner builds)
subsection.p: The recommended application server used by SignServer. Version 4.2.3 is recommended.

subsection.name: Java Development Kit
subsection.p: The Java Development Kit is required to compile and execute. Version 1.6 or above is required.

subsection.name: Database
subsection.p: MySQL is recommended for a SignServer database. MySQL 5.1 is the most tested version.
